reviewText: This is a great start to something all younger children and adult parents, should watch. A follow up video is needed, to add to the scenarios that are important to the safety of children, more self defense scenes.
I've started to use this DVD with my grandchildren, it has been very helpful!
Very informative.  Will be helpful to schools and parents in assisting students with the issue of bullying.  A great resource.

Not quite what I was looking for. I was looking for more practical ways of not becoming a target & not physical self-defense. Though the physical self-defense techniques were good. I was hoping to invite a few friends over to show a video & talk. This video involves repeated viewing.
Was nice to show him he isn't alone and the few techniques he quickly learned.  Now he practices with me for fun but I know they will be valuable to know.  The best advice of course is walk away!
